Club Registration Form
By Law Amendment

Judo Saskatchewan has created the following group to advise on how we might lead Judo Saskatchewan to safely reopen judo as we move forward.
  • Jeff Irvine – representing a northern club
  • Josh Wiens – representing a northern club
  • Kim Bergy Kaip – representing our largest club and a southern club
  • Jim and Michelle Wiens – representing a large club in a stand alone facility and a southern club
  • Carolyn Bagnell – Judo Sask Board member
  • Blair Taylor – Judo Sask Board member.
    • Clubs wishing to open will need to complete this form which will be reviewed by the Committee.



    Announcements
    Judo Canada Return to Judo Documents


    Judo Saskatchewan is a member of Sask Sport and Judo Canada, which is recognized by the International Judo Federation as the governing body of Judo in Canada.
